resources.string: Please contact your company Admin to get access to this account creation.
Your company has enabled single sign-on (SSO)
Authenticate securely with multiple websites by logging in just once with your company SSO login.\n\nClick below to log in with SSO while we\'ll do all the setup work.

Note: Your organization has enabled SSO for Dashlane. While typically prohibited by internal policies, your IT administrator may be able to access the information you store in Dashlane, including personal logins. Dashlane has no control over other organization\'s policies.
Your account rights have changed. Create a strong Master Password to log into Dashlane going forward.
